useCase.name: Adding a New Other Service
useCase.description: Admin wants to add a new other service to the system.

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has admin privileges.

useCase.trigger: Admin wants to add a new other service.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new other service.
UI shows the form to add a new service.
Controller adds the new other service to the system.
Repository saves the new other service to the database.
New service is successfully added to the system.
UI displays success message to the Admin.
